def preprocess_text(text):
    
    text = text.lower()
    text = re.sub(r"[^a-zA-Z0-9]", " ", text)
    text = text.strip()
    text = text.split()
    text = ' '.join(list(filter(lambda x : x not in ['', ' '], text)))
    return text
